Detailed Description

Constraints of selection from set of possibilities.

Definition at line 22 of file IOptionsList.h.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum iprm::IOptionsList::ChangeFlags

Flags for changes related to this interface.

Enumerator
CF_OPTIONS_CHANGED 

Option list updated.

CF_OPTION_RENAMED 

One or more options were renamed.

Definition at line 28 of file IOptionsList.h.

enum iprm::IOptionsList::OptionsFlags

Flags for control constraints behavior.

Enumerator
SCF_NONE 
SCF_SUPPORT_UNIQUE_ID 

If set, every option must have an unique ID.

SFC_DISABLE_ALLOWED 

If set, some options can be disabled.

virtual QByteArray iprm::IOptionsList::GetOptionId ( int  index) const
pure virtual

Get option ID.

The option ID must be unique, if flag SCF_SUPPORT_UNIQUE_ID is set.

See Also
OptionsFlags
